name: Locator
description:
Locator helps you find all instances of a component and enables you to jump to each individual instance.

Usage

1. Select a master component.
2. Launch the Locator plugin.
3. View all instances of this component, the page where they're used and their direct parent.
4. Click on one of the instances in the list to jump to it.

NOTICE: When using the plugin on very large documents, it's gonna take a while to return the instances of a component.
